items.title: The Blue Spruce – Artificial Table Top Christmas Tree – Green – 2 foot
items.summary: “The Blue Spruce” 2ft (60 cm) is a hinged style table top Christmas tree. It has very sturdy but soft PE branches which make this a very pretty table top…

items.title: Snow Flocked Pre-decorated Tree – Artificial Christmas Tree – Snow Flocked Green – 4 foot
items.summary: “The Snow Flocked Pre-Decorated Tree” 4ft (120 cm) is a pre-decorated style artificial Christmas tree. This tree is made from a mixture of PVC and PE branches with three different tips, ranging between three slightly varying shades of light to dark green. The 100 Warm White LED lights are already assembled and combined with the glittery bristles, the brass and charcoal pot, and traditional pine cones to bring a touch of elegance to your display. This tree is easy to assembly in two parts and can be styled as a table top Christmas tree to suit your…
items.content_html: “The Snow Flocked Pre-Decorated Tree” 4ft (120 cm) is a pre-decorated style artificial Christmas tree. This tree is made from a mixture of PVC and PE branches with three different tips, ranging between three slightly varying shades of light to dark green. The 100 Warm White LED lights are already assembled and combined with the glittery bristles, the brass and charcoal pot, and traditional pine cones to bring a touch of elegance to your display. This tree is easy to assembly in two parts and can be styled as a table top Christmas tree to suit your preference.

items.title: Pre-lit Pine Tree with Berries – Artificial Christmas Tree – Green – 4 foot
items.summary: “The Pre-lit Pine Tree with Berries” 4ft (120 cm) is a pre-decorated style artificial Christmas tree. The Pine tree is made from a mixture of PVC and PE branches with three different tips, ranging between three slightly varying shades of dark green. The warm white LED lights are already assembled and combined with the brass pot and traditional red berries to bring a touch of warmth and elegance to your display. This tree is easy to assembly in two parts and can be styled as a table top Christmas tree to suit your…
items.content_html: “The Pre-lit Pine Tree with Berries” 4ft (120 cm) is a pre-decorated style artificial Christmas tree. The Pine tree is made from a mixture of PVC and PE branches with three different tips, ranging between three slightly varying shades of dark green. The warm white LED lights are already assembled and combined with the brass pot and traditional red berries to bring a touch of warmth and elegance to your display. This tree is easy to assembly in two parts and can be styled as a table top Christmas tree to suit your preference.

items.title: Double LED Pine Tree Planter – Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree – Green – 4 foot
items.summary: “The Double LED Pine Tree Planter” stands at 117.5cm and is a hinged style artificial Christmas tree. The Pine tree is pre-lit with warm white LED string lights and comes with a mixture of PVC and PE branches. This artificial tree comes with a dual decorative pot, pre-decorated with traditional red berries and pine cones, which combined with the fact that this is a hinged Christmas tree, result in an easy…
items.content_html: “The Double LED Pine Tree Planter” stands at 117.5cm and is a hinged style artificial Christmas tree. The Pine tree is pre-lit with warm white LED string lights and comes with a mixture of PVC and PE branches. This artificial tree comes with a dual decorative pot, pre-decorated with traditional red berries and pine cones, which combined with the fact that this is a hinged Christmas tree, result in an easy assembly.

items.title: The Austrian – Artificial Table Top Christmas Tree – White – 3 foot
items.summary: “The Austrian – White” 3ft (90 cm) is a hinged style table top Christmas tree. It has a mixture of PVC traditional and needle pine branches. The different styles of white coloured branches combine to make a textured white appearance for those who are looking for a more contemporary style Christmas tree. This Christmas tree looks stunning on its own or for those in favour of colour – it doesn’t matter which colour – it will “pop” on this very pretty White table top Christmas…
items.content_html: “The Austrian – White” 3ft (90 cm) is a hinged style table top Christmas tree.  It has a mixture of PVC traditional and needle pine branches.  The different styles of white coloured branches combine to make a textured white appearance for those who are looking for a more contemporary style Christmas tree.  This Christmas tree looks stunning on its own or for those in favour of colour – it doesn’t matter which colour – it will “pop” on this very pretty White table top Christmas tree.

items.title: Frosted Pine Christmas Tree Small – Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree – Green – 4 foot
items.summary: The Frosted Pine Christmas Tree 4ft (1.2m) is an elegant table top Christmas Tree which will bring a touch of class to your festive display. This table top style Christmas tree consists of PE branches with a light sprinkle of glittery snow to highlight the tips of the needles. The dispersed branches and Warm White LED lights combine for a beautiful tree with an easy “all-in-one”…
items.content_html: The Frosted Pine Christmas Tree 4ft (1.2m) is an elegant table top Christmas Tree which will bring a touch of class to your festive display. This table top style Christmas tree consists of PE branches with a light sprinkle of glittery snow to highlight the tips of the needles. The dispersed branches and Warm White LED lights combine for a beautiful tree with an easy “all-in-one” assembly.

items.title: Snow Flocked Pine Tree – Artificial Table Top Christmas Tree – Snow Flocked Green – 4 foot
items.summary: The “Snow Flocked Pine Tree” 4ft (120 cm) is a snow flocked table top Christmas tree. In this model, its PE branches have been heavily snow flocked to create a wintery feel for those who have experienced a white Christmas. This Christmas tree sits in its own solid base wrapped in a rustic burlap fabric, resulting in an easy “all-in-one” table top solution requiring no further decorations and looks charming even without…
items.content_html:
The “Snow Flocked Pine Tree” 4ft (120 cm) is a snow flocked table top Christmas tree. In this model, its PE branches have been heavily snow flocked to create a wintery feel for those who have experienced a white Christmas.

This Christmas tree sits in its own solid base wrapped in a rustic burlap fabric, resulting in an easy “all-in-one” table top solution requiring no further decorations and looks charming even without lights.

items.title: Snow Flocked Cedar Tree – Artificial Table Top Christmas Tree – Green – 3.5 foot
items.summary: The “Cedar Tree” 3.5ft (106 cm) is a snow flocked table top Christmas tree. In this model, the tips of its PE branches have been lightly snow flocked to create a premium table top Christmas Tree for your display. This Christmas tree sits in its own solid base wrapped in a rustic burlap fabric, resulting in an easy “all-in-one” table top solution requiring no further decorations and looks charming even without lights. This snow flocked tree can be placed just about anywhere to suit your…
items.content_html:
The “Cedar Tree” 3.5ft (106 cm) is a snow flocked table top Christmas tree. In this model, the tips of its PE branches have been lightly snow flocked to create a premium table top Christmas Tree for your display.

This Christmas tree sits in its own solid base wrapped in a rustic burlap fabric, resulting in an easy “all-in-one” table top solution requiring no further decorations and looks charming even without lights. This snow flocked tree can be placed just about anywhere to suit your preference.

items.title: Crystallised Frosting – Artificial Table Top Christmas Tree – Green – 3 foot
items.summary: “Crystallised Frosting” 3ft (90 cm) is a snow flocked table top Christmas tree. In this model, its PE branches have pretty acrylic beads to create its name sake Crystallised Frosting. This Christmas tree sits in its own solid base wrapped in a rustic burlap fabric, resulting in an easy “all-in-one” table top solution requiring no further decorations and looks charming even without…
items.content_html:
“Crystallised Frosting” 3ft (90 cm) is a snow flocked table top Christmas tree. In this model, its PE branches have pretty acrylic beads to create its name sake Crystallised Frosting.

This Christmas tree sits in its own solid base wrapped in a rustic burlap fabric, resulting in an easy “all-in-one” table top solution requiring no further decorations and looks charming even without lights.
